data.eml:eml: Rubroshiraia gen. nov., a second hypocrellin-producing genus in Shiraiaceae (Pleosporales)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Dong-Qin, Wijayawardene, Nalin N., Tang, Li-Zhou, Liu, Chao, Han, Li-Hong, Chu, Hong-Long, Wang, Hai-Bo, Liao, Chun-Fang, Yang, Er-Fu, Xu, Rui-Fang, Li, Yun-Min, Hyde, Kevin D., Bhat, D. Jayarama, Cannon, Paul F. (2019): Rubroshiraia gen. nov., a second hypocrellin-producing genus in Shiraiaceae (Pleosporales). MycoKeys 58: 1-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.58.36723, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.58.36723
